short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A convenient way to select a tab group with a keyboard shortcut or a popup menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to bring a tab group to the foreground.  The keyboard shortcut or clicking the extension's icon will show a list of the currently open tab groups.  Select one with your mouse or by first navigating with the up/down arrows and the enter key to select.
